name: Speed Boat Driving
description:
Driving a speed scooty jet ski is always exciting, but this jet ski driving game gives you something more than just typical turbo scooty racing fun, it give you the real experience of controlling a jet skis and performing stunts with water scooty that you never imagined you could.

Features:
• Water scooter hurdles like ramps and loops and balls and boats.
• Responsive controls for Jet Ski racing
• Stunning Jet Ski driving levels
• Epic speed scooty Jet Ski maneuvers
